action_description: This action will turn off your myHue lights.
This Action will turn on your myHue lights.
This action will enable the party mode of your myHue lights.
This action will enable the wakeup mode.
This action will change the effect of your myHue lights.
This action will change the temperature of your myHue lights.
This action will change the color of your myHue lights.
This action will change the brightness of your myHue lights.
This action will enable the bedtime mode.
